casebody.data:
Anthony SINCHAK
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 20, 2017 Michael W. Brown, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Margaret Gaffney Radionovas, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Anthony Sinchak's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 352 , 163 A.3d 1208 (AC 37363), is denied.
